# Nine Men's Morris Flutter Game

This project implements the classic Nine Men's Morris board game using Flutter for cross-platform mobile and desktop support.

## Project Structure
- **lib/**: Main Dart source code
- **lib/models/**: Game logic and data models
- **lib/screens/**: UI screens and pages
- **lib/widgets/**: Reusable UI components
- **lib/utils/**: Helper utilities and constants
- **assets/**: Game assets (images, sounds)

## Development Guidelines
- Follow Flutter/Dart best practices
- Use clean architecture principles
- Implement responsive design for multiple screen sizes
- Support both touch and mouse input
- Include proper game state management

## Game Features
- Classic Nine Men's Morris gameplay
- Single-player vs AI
- Local multiplayer
- Cross-platform support (mobile, desktop)
- Game state persistence
- Animated moves and transitions
